attributes.comment:
I think the proposed increase for N-600 processing from $255 to $460 is excessive. I am
an adoptive parent who has no choice but to file this paperwork even though my daughter is
legally a U.S. citizen, having been adopted from China in late 2001. Parents adopting in
recent years receive the Certificate of Citizenship automatically a few weeks after they
return home. However, parents in my position must file the N-600, wait months for an
appointment to drive many hours for an interview, and pay a very steep fee. I sincerely
hope this increase will be reconsidered.

Juliana M. Ma, Ph.D.
born in New York City
daughter adopted from China in Sept 2001

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Juliana Ma
